channel.title: Krim on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Krim on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Krim
item.description: If Krim is covered with clouds in the evening then there will be bad weather tomorrow. If its not then the weather will be fair. Well, that what we were told and that is the knowledge we stuck by. Krim is a 1,107m tall mountain on the southern outskirts of the Ljubljana moors. In all the years I have lived in Slovenia I have never actually been up it.
